page.title: .text() - Minified.js
page.main:
back to Overview

.text()

Returns the concatenated text content of all nodes in the list.

Syntax

text()

Description

Returns the concatenated text content of all nodes in the list. This is done by going recursively through all elements and their children. The values of text and CDATA nodes will be appended to the resulting string.

Please note that, unlike jQuery's text(), Minified's will not set text content. Use fill() to do this.

Example

Returns the text of the element with the id 'myContainer'. 

var content = $('#myContainer').text();
